alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Northern Washington; Southern Penobscot; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 11 at 6:15AM EST until January 11 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected this morning. Wind chills as low as 20 to 25 below zero expected this morning. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Coastal DownEast, Far Eastern, Interior DownEast and Penobscot Valley Maine. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 15 minutes.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and the wind will combine to create low wind chills. Frostbite and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken. Make sure you wear a hat and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Northern Washington; Southern Penobscot; Southern Piscataquis
